import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Paginacao from './Paginacao'; import Navbar from './NavBar'; import Cadastro from './Cadastro'; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; function PaginaInicial() { const [usuarios, setUsuarios] = useState('') useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:8080/usuario/getAll") .then( res => res.json()) .then((resultado)=>{ setUsuarios(resultado) }) }) return (
/{/* ---------------------------- NavBar ------------------------------- */}
API REST
); } export default PaginaInicial;
